snippet: The British D.J. and radio personality will anchor a new station on iHeartRadio, Clear Channel's online brand. Also, streaming music keeps growing; a Sony digital executive resigns.
abstract: The British D.J. and radio personality will anchor a new station on iHeartRadio, Clear Channel's online brand. Also, streaming music keeps growing; a Sony digital executive resigns.

headline.main: Clear Channel Bets on Electronic Dance Music, Signing Up Pete Tong
